entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Tadoussac
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 p.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow or freezing rain. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or ice pellets beginning this evening then changing to freezing rain overnight. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Freezing rain or rain. High 13.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to a few rain showers and ending near noon then clearing. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 13. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few rain showers beginning late in the evening then changing to flurries near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
